@sebastienlorber @zachleat @slightlylate @kylemathews @youyuxi @swyx @sarah_edo @Rich_Harris If a view of the content is generated in the browser with javascript, I consider that a client-side render. Gatsby absolutely does client-side rendering. That rendering can happen as an enhancement for subsequent pages after the entry point is delivered as pre-rendered HTML.
